mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.operation_action , t1.req_json , t1.err_json , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_log t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update car_loan_log t1 set t1.id =#{dto.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.order_number =#{dto.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.operation_action =#{dto.operationAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.req_json =#{dto.reqJson,jdbcType=CLOB}, t1.err_json =#{dto.errJson,jdbcType=CLOB}, t1.creation_time =#{dto.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.update_time =#{dto.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from car_loan_log where id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update car_loan_log t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
